content:
pattern calls for 8 oz of baby pompadour yarn in two colors plus small amounts of baby yarn in two additional colors no specific yarn or yarn or yardage given **additional materials **
- 2 black 12mm eyes with lock washers
- 15mm black nose with lock washer
- fiberfill
- 3/4 by 14 strip of interfacing
- yarn needle
this was annie s attic free pattern of the day for 08/04/2006 08/04/2007 and 08/04/2008 free-crochet 1 1 https //www free-crochet com/crochet_for_babies_and_children/baby_pacifier/
